RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Digibitsy (based on unlessgames)
RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: breakmapper
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Generate single velocity #1 to #127 stacked keyzone for all Breaks 0-1536. Implements a dialog to generate stacked keyzones for multiple samples distributed along the velocity range or octaves etc. Based on "unlessgames' zoner: https://gitlab.com/unlessgames/unless_renoise"
